articles.author: Bernard Condon, Matt Ott
articles.title: Tesla hit with probe after crashes involving a self-driving feature that Musk has boasted about - AP News
articles.description: Federal regulators have opened yet another investigation into Tesla’s so-called full-self driving technology after dozens of incidents in which the electric vehicle maker’s cars ran red lights or drove on the wrong side of the road, sometimes crashing into ot…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Federal regulators have opened yet another investigation into Teslas self-driving feature after dozens of incidents in which the cars ran red lights or drove on the wrong side of the ro… [+4425 chars]
